Description: Place the cup on coffee maker. Turn on the coffee machine to make coffee.
Put the dirty plates in sinkbasin and use the dish sponge to clean.
Take knife and cut apple
Place bread into toaster and turn on
Take pan and place on stove. Turn on gas burner with stove knob. Crack egg into pan after pan is hot. Use spatula to lift egg off pan once cooked and place on plate.
Cut tomato with knife into slices. Fill a pot with water. Place pot with water on gasburner. Turn gasburner on. Add tomato slices to the pot. Leave to cook for 5 minutes. Turn off gasburner.
Cut lettuce with knife into slices. Add lettuce slices to the pot. Leave to cook for 5 minutes. Turn off gasburner.
Take pot to sink and add water. Put pot on stove. Turn on gas burner with stove knob. Boil water.
Take the bin. Throw away the creacked eggs.
Open fridge door and remove everything and place items on countertop.
Cut the potato using knife and microwave
Take the WineBottle and pour into cup
Take apple,bread ,egg,lettuce,tomato and WineBottle and store in fridge.
Take the cup and fill with water
Take the potato and boil in a pot filled with water.
Throw the unused apple slices into the bin.
firstly, select all the kitchen utensils and keep those in drawer

Task: Pour away coffee in a cup_13_5
Description: firstly, check for the cup with coffee and then pour away
check for the pot with water and then pour it away
go to the kitchen and switch off the kitchen light if it is on
Find the laptop, open it and turn it on.
Walk to sofa. Pick up remote. Aim remote at the television. Press the power button on the remote. Sit down on sofa. Watch the television.

Task: Check the timing on the watch_203_5
Description: Walk to coffee table. Pick up watch. Look at watch's screen. Read the time on the watch.
Walk to the end table. Pick up the vase and tissue box. Walk to the box. Place the vase and tissue box in the box. Close the box.
Walk to end table. Observe if tissue box is used. Pick up used tissue box. Walk to bin. Open bin. Drop used tissue box in bin. Close bin.

Task: Turn off the table lamp or desk lamp_203_5
Description: Walk to the lamps, and switch it off.
Locate cell phone. Walk to cell phone. Pick up cell phone. Walk to coffee table. Hold cell phone's screen face down. Hit the cell phone's screen against the coffee table.
Locate the cell phone. Walk to the cell phone. Pick up the cell phone. Press the power button. Interact with the cell phone's display.
Walk to sofa. Pick up the remote and pillow. Turn around. Place the remote and pillow on the coffee table.
Pick up the book on the long table and go over to the sofa to read it.
